attributes.action: utterly repudiate all petitions asking for traffic lights to be abolished or reduced
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: While looking through the petitions relating to traffic lights I saw a considerable number asking for such lights to be abolished etc.  These were all obviously from drivers; one asked for drivers to be able to turn left at a red light "where it is safe to do so" by which I doubt very much that the creator had the safety of PEDESTRIANS in mind.  How would fewer traffic lights impact on the safety of pedestrians crossing the road? (or trying to!)  How many accidents, and possibly even deaths, of innocent pedestrians might this cause?
